# Power-Hungry (Drawback)
## Overview
**Power-Hungry:** You're addicted to power. You take a â€”2 penalty on Will saving throws against charm and compulsion effects if the creature creating the effect promises wealth or power.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 65
